website_summaries.verdict: Considered as a classic shoe, the latest Nike Sock Racer Flyknit takes an old silhouette and turns it into a contemporary version. The 2017 iteration is infused with modern technology with the additional Flyknit upper. With a Flyknit-constructed upper, the low-top silhouette is basically lighter, more breathable and offers an improved fit.Both a trend-maker and trend-breaker, these shoes perfectly suit the modern times, as well as the warm seasons with its overall structure and quality.
pros: According to a lot of wearers, the Nike Air Sockracer Flyknit is one of the most impressive Nike Flyknits ever made
Some have claimed that these are one of the most comfortable slip-on trainers they have ever owned
These Flyknit shoes are super lightweight making them a great choice for workouts, as per several buyers
Many have commented that these runners give a very flexible feel
The lightweight material of the shoes make them very breathable, as plenty have reported
Numerous testers have observed that these are easy to put on and feel good on feet
Heaps of wearers attest that these Nike shoes fit like a glove
They are great everyday performance shoes, based on the majority of users
cons: A few testers find that the soles get crease marks even when wearing them for the first time
The insoles of the Sockracer Flyknit do not stay put and keep popping out everytime the shoes are taken off, as a couple of buyers have experienced

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING STYLE and Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I am a sneaker head- I dress from the shoes up- I have a lot of kicks and these rank right up there in style and comfort I work out 6days a week with weights and then do stairs for my cardio and these sockracers do not disappoint they r amazing in every way u can wear them to the gym or u can rock them with your favorite denim a Def must have u will have a new go to pair of kicks
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Wright

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were only worn a few times and are trash. Clip broke. Worn a few times for a month. Not worth purchasing. Time passed for return and says I can't return. Amazon was great. They refunded my $ for store credit. Once again this is one more reason j love Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Grammie

customer_reviews.title: Great Condition
customer_reviews.text: Item was shipped brand new and was delivered fast. Fits exactly like my other pair of sock racers. This colorway is difficult to find and I got it for a great price. Came with the Nike shoebox aswell. Would buy again from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes with 1 small weakness!
customer_reviews.text: They are good shoes, very light comfortable and nice looking, but the grey color on the front of rubber sole of the shoe started pealing after couple of days wearing them. All the rest is great!
customer_reviews.author: Trey Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit as expected. Boyfriend got as gift and claims they are the most comfortable shoes he has ever owned. He is a chef and spends 15 hours at a time on feet running around, so it helped a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Moonchild

customer_reviews.title: Nike st it’s bedt.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice shoes. Looks great, easy to put on and feels good.
customer_reviews.author: Al Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great ‘House’ Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great ‘house shoe’ for Summer. Light, fit well, and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: JSL

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable and poorly shaped
customer_reviews.text: Not comfortable and poorly shaped. Toes were clearly visible through the top of the shoe as if I were wearing sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Shaker

customer_reviews.title: TBO this is more like a general purpose show
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a running shoe. TBO this is more like a general purpose shoe, gonna get myself an asics now...
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: Insoles does not stay put
customer_reviews.text: Shoes looks nice and comfy. The biggest problem is the insole keeps popping out every time you take the shoe off and it’s really annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin from accounting

customer_reviews.title: Good with bare feet.
customer_reviews.text: Good size in bare feet. A little snug with a light sock.
customer_reviews.author: DoctorOfGolf

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe. Comfortable fit and flexible feel. However after about 15 uses the shoe ripped 🤦🏾‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Love the flyknit
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes , have another pair in the black/grey
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Yoshida

customer_reviews.title: Bad shoe design.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible design. Velcro isn’t tight enough and foot slides around.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: squished shoe
customer_reviews.text: One shoe looks like its squished and the glue has started to show, not what i expeceted
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes bought for my grandson
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed that they left them on the front porch because I have a note on the door plus I have instructions to put all my merchandise on my side deck I live on a corner where it would be very easy for my packages to get stolen so I asked that everything be delivered on my side deck other than that no problems
customer_reviews.author: DEBORAH HOWELL
